text: Rise of the Rōnin is a 2024 action-role playing game developed by Koei Tecmo's Team Ninja and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment. This game is similar to Ghost of Tsushima, as both were published by Sony Interactive Entertainment and PS Studios, both are open-world, both are action-adventure, both are samurai games, both are set in Japan, both use horses as main transportation systems, and both are RPGs. This game is currently a PS5 exclusive, and there are currently no plans for a PC release. title: Rise of the Rōnin
